PtSituationElement.Summary: Various Queens local and express buses are running with delays in both directions because of traffic conditions in the Queens Plaza area. See mta.info

PtSituationElement.LongDescription: B62, Q32, Q39, Q60, Q66, Q67, Q100, Q101, Q102 and QM2 buses are running with delays in both directions because of traffic conditions in the Queens Plaza area.

PtSituationElement.Summary: B8 westbound buses are bypassing the bus stop at Ocean Av and Foster Av because of road construction.
PtSituationElement.Description: B8 westbound bus stop closure because of road construction at Ocean Av and Foster Av.
PtSituationElement.LongDescription:
B8 westbound buses are bypassing the bus stop at Ocean Av and Foster Av because of road construction. Streets are closed in both directions because of traffic conditions.

Customer may use the bus stop at near side of Ocean Av.

PtSituationElement.Summary: Bx21 buses are detoured in both directions because of FDNY activity at Boston Rd between E 168 St and E 169 St.
PtSituationElement.Description: Bx21 buses are detoured in both directions because of FDNY activity at Boston Rd between E 168 St and E 169 St.
PtSituationElement.LongDescription:
Bx21 buses are detoured in both directions because of FDNY activity at Boston Rd between E 168 St and E 169 St.

Detour is as follows:

Bx21 Southbound: Via Boston Rd, right on E 169 St, left on Franklin Av, left on 3 Av and regular route.

Bx21 Northbound: Via Boston Rd, right on E 168 St, left on Tinton Av, left on E 169 St, right on Boston Rd and regular route.

PtSituationElement.Summary: QM2, QM4, QM5 and QM6 westbound buses are detoured because of traffic conditions on the Queens-Midtown Tunnel. See mta.info
PtSituationElement.Description: QM2, QM4, QM5 and QM6 westbound buses are detoured because of traffic conditions on the Queens-Midtown Tunnel. See mta.info
PtSituationElement.LongDescription:
QM2, QM4, QM5 and QM6 westbound buses are detoured because of traffic conditions on the Queens-Midtown Tunnel.

Detour is as follows:

Westbound: Via LIE westbound, exit Greenpoint Av, right into Hunters Point Av, Hunters Point Av onto 49 Av, left on 21 St, right into Midtown Tunnel and regular route.

B24 - Northbound buses may experience delays due to construction on Greenpoint Av at West St

Until further notice

• Please allow additional travel time.

PtSituationElement.Description: M1/M1
PtSituationElement.LongDescription:
M1/M1 LTD, M4/M4 LTD and Q32 - South/Westbound holiday bus stop changes in Midtown

Until Saturday, Jan 6, 2018

Buses will not stop on 5 Av at 49 St. Please use the nearby stop on 52 St instead.

Local buses also stop on 46 St.

Reminder: M1 LTD and M4 LTD buses do not operate weekends.
[TP]

Reminder: M2 LTD and M3 buses do not operate overnight.
